name: 蕭榮修
objective:
介紹嵌入式計算系統設計原理,使學生瞭解如何使用計算機軟、硬體
為元件來設計嵌入式計算系統。
1.嵌入式計算系統簡介
2.指令集
3.中央處理器
4.嵌入式計算平台
5.程式設計與分析
6.程序與作業系統
7.硬體加速器
8.網路與分散式嵌入式系統
9.系統設計方法
schedule:
1. CH 1. Embedded Computing
   1-1 Introduction
2. 1-2 A Unified Hardware/Software Overview: Co-design 
3. 1-3 System Design Process 
4. CH 2. Embedded Hardware: Embedded Processors, Embedded Computing  Platform 
2-1 Instruction Sets: ARM Processor
2-2 CPUs
2-3 Instruction Set Architecture (ISA)
5. 2-4 The Embedded Computing Platform
6. JTAG and Debug
7. Bootloader
8. CH 3. Program Design and Analysis
3-1 Program Design and Analysis
9. Mid-term Exam
10. 3-2 Programming Embedded Systems in C and C++
11. CH 4. Embedded Software: Device Drivers, Embedded OS, Middleware and Application
 4-1 Processes and Operating Systems
12. 4-2 Introduction to Embedded Linux, ARMLinux porting
13. 4-3 Device Drivers  
14. CH 5. Real-time OS
15. CH 6. Hardware Accelerators
16. CH 7. Networked Embedded Systems
17. CH 8. Systems Design Techniques 
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1. Assignments (reading and lab reports): 30%
2. Mid-term Exam: 30%
3. Final Exam: 30%
4. Attendance: 10%
materials:
Textbooks:
1. Computers as Components: Principles of Embedded Computing, Wayne Wolf, Morgan Kaufmann Publishers, 2001. (以電腦為組件：嵌入式系統設計原理，蕭榮修譯，全華)
2. Embedded Systems: Architecture, Programming and Design, Raj Kamal, Tata McGraw Hill, 2003. (滄海) (嵌入式系統：結構、程式設計、系統設計，吳家榮譯，全華)
3. 嵌入式系統設計 ─ 以ARM處理器基礎之SOC平台，黃悅民等編著，滄海
